description: MIDAS Wake County. 2005-2009 U.S. synthesized population data set  version 1-2. Version 1-2 includes Version 1 generic synthesized households with Version 2 group quarters facilities and synthesized persons who reside in them. Population sampling is from the US Census American Community Survey.

metadata.attribution: Wheaton, W.D. (August, 2012). 2005-2009 U.S. Synthetic Population Ver 2. RTI International.
